Class ExamBlockView

Object
ExamBlockView

public class ExamBlockView extends Object implements ModelObserver
the V in MVC model. Drives and owns the UI

    • hasUnfinalisedSessions

      public boolean hasUnfinalisedSessions()
      Checks if there are any un-finalized sessions in the JTree. A session is un-finalized if any Exam node has no Desk children.
      Returns:
      true if un-finalized sessions exist, false otherwise
